message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm confident you'll find it meets your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and what I've seen in the market. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $1300000?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1350000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $1280000? That's my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $1280000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle one more time, so I'll offer you $1320000. This is my final compromise, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm afraid $1320000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1200000, which is the price I've been willing to pay from the start. I'm not willing to go any higher, so I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
